qas.question: Which of the United States is Boston located in?
How many square miles is the city proper of Boston?
The large metropolitan area of Boston is also called what?
What is the estimated population of Greater Boston?
What is the capital and largest city in Massachusetts?

context: <a4_0>Boston<a4_0/> (pronounced i/ˈbɒstən/) is the capital and largest city of the Commonwealth of <a0_0>Massachusetts<a0_0/> in the United States. Boston also served as the historic county seat of Suffolk County until Massachusetts disbanded county government in 1999. The city proper covers <a1_0>48<a1_0/> square miles (124 km2) with an estimated population of 655,884 in 2014, making it the largest city in New England and the 24th largest city in the United States. The city is the economic and cultural anchor of a substantially larger metropolitan area called <a2_0>Greater Boston<a2_0/>, home to <a3_0>4.7 million people<a3_0/> and the tenth-largest metropolitan statistical area in the country. Greater Boston as a commuting region is home to 8.1 million people, making it the sixth-largest combined statistical area in the United States.
